title: The Prize of Peril - Le prix du danger [1983 - France] sci fi
description: The Prize of Peril [1983 - France, Yugoslavia] Le prix du danger Action / Drama / Science Fiction http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0084540/ In a futuristic society the most popular television game show is one where everyday men or women volunteer to be hunted. They are stalked and killed by a team of five pursuers, also volunteers, from different walks of life. If they survive they will get an enormous cash prize, but no one has. Director Yves Boisset sued Twentieth Century Fox because the 1987 movie Running Man, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, used a screenplay which was exactly the same as his own film. Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 672x576, 25.000 fps, 2649 kbps, 01h34m33s Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 192 kbps DVDRip, French audio, optional subtitles English, Romanian, Spanish, Turkish https://extraimage.net/images/2017/11/11/5ac91d6b76105983d1fd5b4142509f96.jpg https://extraimage.net/images/2017/11/11/4d0dc14eab9c8545343138d6d1ae11bb.jpg
